traceability.evidence: • src/cli-options.js: recognizes --update and --yes/-y flags (REQ-UPDATE-FLAG, REQ-YES-FLAG) • src/print-outdated.js & src/update-packages.js: applyFilters→safeRows only, preview prompt, backup creation, JSON.stringify indent=2, summary & install reminder, error handling in fs.copyFileSync and writeFileSync • bin/dry-aged-deps.js: help text includes --update and -y flags • Unit tests in test/printOutdated.update.test.js, printOutdated.updatePromptAbort.test.js, printOutdated.updateBackupError.test.js, update-packages.test.js cover all flows (preview, confirm, abort, backup errors, skipConfirmation, summary, install prompt) • Functional E2E test in test/functional-assessment.test.js verifies CLI end-to-end behavior for story 011.0 (exit code, output, package.json update, backup file) • All 164 Vitest tests pass with 94%+ coverage as per cycle assessment
traceability.notes: The implementation fully meets the acceptance criteria for 011.0-DEV-AUTO-UPDATE: the CLI supports the --update and --yes flags, only updates safe packages, shows a preview with a confirmation prompt (skippable with --yes), creates a backup, preserves JSON formatting, logs a summary and an npm install reminder, and handles backup/write errors gracefully. Comprehensive unit and functional tests confirm correct behavior.
